entry.title: We Never Know
entry.summary:
Author: Robin_Fai

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 6,704Chapters: 4/22Kudos: 65

Summary: Once he’s safely in the Jeep Buck lets his head fall back against the seat. He’s not having a panic attack, he’s not going to be sick, and he’s certainly not going to cry. Buck just feels lost. Suddenly he’s as much the kid the others think him to be. How is he supposed to cope with this. “Why are you still fucking dead?” Buck asks the imaginary Bobby in the passenger seat. “You were supposed to be here for me for this sort of shit. You were supposed to tell me what to do.” In the wake of Bobby's death and the birth of his nephew, Buck receives a diagnosis and makes some well meaning, but ultimately ill considered life choices. Will the path he's set himself on break him? Or will it be the making of the next new iteration of Buck?

entry.title: My Beloved Ghost and Me.
entry.summary:
Author: daggerandrosie

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 88,911Chapters: 14/17Kudos: 41

Summary: “Listen Buckley, I need you to know that this whole…” The officer gestured to his' clothes. “Gothics United Against Following Curfew club you're a part of can end up real bad, you can die kid. Or worse, go to jail.”Buck doesn't think he looks much like a goth, aside from wearing black, and he only does it because it's easier to sneak around like that, there's nothing about him… Scratch that. Officer Gallagher just found him lurking around the cemetery at two in the morning. Because he talks to ghosts.Always have and probably always will.It fucking sucks.It sucks. so. bad.And now he has one. A ghost. In his room. A very handsome one at that, an old cowboy with a cowboy hat, tight pants, boots and big brown eyes.Buck is so, so, very fucked

entry.title: Blue Pink White Pink Blue
entry.summary:
Author: Warlock_Nerd

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 27,843Chapters: 20/23Kudos: 401

Summary: Bobby noticed him first and went up to him. "Can I help you, young man?"The teenager shuffled forward. "I'm looking for Edmundo, Edmundo Diaz? He works here."Hearing his name, Eddie's brow furrowed. He stepped closer. At first, he didn't recognize the face. The sharp shape of the jaw, the curve of the mouth… then it clicked."Rachel?" He called, a question laced with surprise.The teenager straightened, "I go by Raphael now."***Eddie gets an unexpected visitor one day on shift, it’s his little cousin who needs a place to stay after getting kicked out by his parents :3 Just so everything is clear. This happens in an alternate universe where season 8 happened a lot differently. Bobby is alive and well, Eddie and Chris never went to Texas, the whole Kim Marisol thing never happened and Buck lives with Eddie due to the loft disappearing or something. (Shh. Don’t read too much into it.)Chris is 14.Enjoy :3

entry.summary:

entry.title: Blue November Star
entry.summary:
Author: ash_ptv

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 31,246Chapters: 14/?Kudos: 83

Summary: Buck and Eddie have a falling out before Eddie moves to Texas, which means they aren't on speaking terms with each other. Buck feels horrible for how things ended and wants to apologize but isn't sure where to start so he decides he needs to spend some time in Texas to truly show he's sorry and possibly tell Eddie about some unresolved feelings. Unfortunately for Buck, he has an accident and doesn't make it to Texas. His accident causes him to lose his memory. So, Evan "Buck" Buckley no longer remembers his name or the names of his loved ones. How will this accident effect Buck in the long run? How will Eddie react learning his former best friend is hospitalized?

entry.title: Right Hand Red
entry.summary:
Author: James_Madison_617

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 2,705Chapters: 1/1Kudos: 23

Summary: Game nights were common among the 118 and their spouses, meeting up at Bobby and Athena’s place and setting up in their living room, everyone bringing a game for them to play. Today however, Maddie and Chim brought twister, insisting it would be funny since they’re all older than the target demographic and therefore more likely to fail.Karen and her wife were all tangled up with each other, somehow managing to be face to face. Hen smiled and kissed her, saying something a little flirty before they both laughed. Unfortunately, their bodies moved too much with the laughter and they collapsed on top of one another, both women letting out a small “oomph” before kissing again and getting off the colorful mat.“Where's my kiss?” Buck said, batting his eyes innocently at Eddie, the last two left. They both laughed and continued the game, though Eddie was far too excited to have his whole body pressed against Buck Or,Eddie is very horny for Buck, and they have sex about it after a game of twister

entry.title: Embers Between Us
entry.summary:
Author: Madforyou

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 44,843Chapters: 10/?Kudos: 317

Summary: The picture on the back is a dark tree line contrasted by the wide blue sky above it. ‘GEORGIA’ is written in big white letters across the top, the bottom saying “Welcome to Adventure.” It’s faded, like it has taken one too many trips in the back of a mail truck, tattered and worn.Eddie flips it over, the back scrawled with quick but somewhat neat handwriting—something personal. Scanning the words his eyes drop to the corner—the address.‘Maddie Kendall, 1500 Hemlock Ave, Hershey, PA 17033’What the hell?Or,An AU where Buck's postcards, which he sent to Maddie, were forwarded to Eddie on deployment by mistake through a Military Outreach Program. They become a reason for Eddie to hold on through the dark times, becoming attached to the man behind the letters and his stories of his travels. Until, by a twist of fate, they bring him face to face with Buck himself.

entry.title: No Grave Can Hold My Body Down (I'll Crawl Back To Her)
entry.summary:
Author: falling_star13

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 3,349Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 52

Summary: I’m using all the headcanonsBobby breaks out of a government facility, and can’t remember anything but he remembers someone important to him. Athena. And somewhere. The 118 firehouse in Los Angeles. With no memories he finds his way to the 118 asking for AthenaThe 118 crew make it their mission to get Bobby’s memories back. Athena makes it her mission to find who took her husband and how to make sure they never do it again.Eddie and Buck are still living together, and Eddie has been trying to tell Buck he’s in love with him. It’s not working.Somehow Karen ends up ropes into helping Athena.Maddie is on mat leave so when Bobby can’t be at the firehouse or at home, he hangs out with her and she gets to introduce her son to his namesake. Chimney is handling this well.Hen is trying really hard to manage all the chaos.Ravi is a main and gets to get in on all the insanity.Bobby thinks Buck is his kid and no one corrects him.All that and more. Fluff, angst, hijinx. let’s have some fun

entry.title: One Thing Led to Love
entry.summary:
Author: mostly_luminous

Rating: Not RatedLanguage: EnglishWords: 38,039Chapters: 7/7Kudos: 61

Summary: Eddie’s voice came low. “What are you saying?”Buck backed away another step, like he could physically put distance between himself and that truth.“I can’t do this,” he muttered, voice cracking. “I can’t stand here and explain to you how it felt when you touched me like I was something you wanted. When you made me believe that maybe... maybe we were finally on the same page.”“Buck–”“No,” Buck said quickly, shaking his head, the pressure finally breaking in his voice. “You forgot. You forgot everything. And I…I’ve been walking around like it was this giant, irreversible thing between us and you didn’t even know it happened.”-Summary: Eddie and Christopher are finally back in L.A. Bobby retired. Henrieta appointed as the new captain. Chimney and Maddie welcome their new baby girl. And Buck is out to have fun with Ravi, trying to find a new connection and give his heart another chance after his heartbreak with Tommy.or, Eddie got a call on one of Buck’s nights out with Ravi. They got too drunk, then one thing led to another…. or more.
